AUTHOR: orels1
DESCRIPTION:
A set of commands to help you test/get data from different APIs.

Available commands:
[p]api get <url> <w_headers=False> - Performs a GET request to selected URL, you can set custom headers adding "true" after the url
[p]api post/put <url> - Performs POST or PUT request to selected URL, you will be asked to add headers or body to the request
NAME: Apitools
